en-US.label.title: Pending Payments
en-US.tooltip.recurring-payment.edit.disabled: Please note: It's not possible to edit recurring payments. You will need to delete and recreate the payment.

en-US.tooltip.payment.in-process.disabled: You cannot edit or delete a payment which is in-process.

en-US.delete-dialog.button.bodyText: Are you sure you want to delete this payment? This action can not be undone.
